title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\ReplaceDictionaryConfig
name: ReplaceDictionaryConfig
description:
Replace each input value with a value randomly selected from the dictionary.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.ReplaceDictionaryConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.word_list
params.description: A list of words to select from for random replacement. The limits page contains details about the size limits of dictionaries.
